com.tilisty.models

Class TiProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tilisty.models.AbstractModel
      • com.tilisty.models.TiProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObservable, IObserver

    public class TiProperty
extends AbstractModel
implements IObserver
    A Representation of a property of a Titanium View. Can take one of two forms, PROPERTY_TYPE_NORMAL or PROPERTY_TYPE_OBJECT. The latter of which creates sub properties of this property. If normal it will just have a key and a value which map directly to the titanium names for these properties.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jason Simpson
